citation: Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Amendment Act 2019 fix 31 March 2022 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

21 March 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 March 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
